nodes.text: The Battle of Manari was fought in 19.5 BBY as part of the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and an anti-Republic force on the Expansion Region planet Manari. Jedi General Roan Shryne was one of the combatants present, and his second Padawan died during the fighting. As a result of his Padawan's death, Shryne changed, becoming disillusioned about the war and losing hope in the Jedi Council.
The Battle of Manari was first mentioned in Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader, a 2005 novel written by James Luceno.
